mapper.select: select count(*) from nm_basket where nmidx=#{nmidx} and fidx=#{fidx} and restime = #{restime} and residx=0
mapper.update: UPDATE nm_basket set count=count+1 where fidx=#{fidx} and nmidx=#{nmidx} and restime = #{restime} and residx=0
mapper.select: select NVL(Max(s.count),0) from nm_basket s where nmidx=#{nmidx} and fidx=#{fidx} and residx=0 and today=to_char(sysdate,'DD/MM/RR') and restime=to_char(#{restime})
select n.idx as idx,f.fname as fname,f.price as price,n.count as count,n.today as today from food f Inner JOIN nm_basket n on f.idx=n.fidx where n.nmidx=#{nmidx}
select SUM(f.price) from food f Inner JOIN nm_basket n on f.idx=n.fidx where n.nmidx=#{nmidx} and residx=0
